# [Interview #111: Brisbane Signing Report - Joel Gilmore, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=111#3)

#### Robert Jordan

The shimmering thing with Ishamael in the prologue of
*The Eye of the World*
was because of a True Power gateway!
